newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Midcontinent Group Three gasoline basis firms.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Midcontinent Group Three gasoline basis firms.

text.p: U.S. Midcontinent unleaded gasoline basis firmed in Group Three on Monday as buyers emerged in the spot market seeking January barrels, traders said.
Bids on unleaded gasoline in Group Three firmed to 2.50 cents a gallon under the print and sellers were heard holding out for offers at 2.0 cents under, traders said.
Traders attributed the firmess to buyers seeking out bargains in the spot market, and some suspected refiner buying was fueling the higher bids.
